Room.Name: Skies Over Brownhaven
Room.ShortDescription: You are flying low over a road to Brownhaven. 30.n1.e0.s0.w1
Room.LongDescription: The copper dragon swoops down toward the old caravan road to get a better look at the pack train of horses, mules, camels, llamas, and other exotic creatures. Startled faces look up as you drop low toward them. They seem to be carrying a rich variety of trade goods. One group of camels seem to be particularly well guarded.
